config.safeTiles.name: Safe tiles
config.safeTiles.tooltip: If enabled, lightning strikes will not be able to strike tiles, destroying them. This includes crops.
config.safeFruitTrees.name: Safe fruit trees
config.safeFruitTrees.tooltip: If enabled, lightning strikes will not be able to strike fruit trees, temporarily turning them into coal trees.
config.bigLightningBehavior.name: "Big lightning"
config.bigLightningBehavior.tooltip: When the "big lightning" audiovisual effect should be used.
